Why is everyone obsessed with this new game?

Have you ever wanted to dive into a world where mystery and strategy collide? Identity V is here to take you on an unforgettable journey! This app is not just a game; it's an experience that blends immersive storytelling with thrilling gameplay.

What does this app offer?

Identity V is packed with features that will keep you hooked:

  • Asymmetrical gameplay: Play as either a survivor or a hunter, each with unique abilities.
  • Stunning visuals: Enjoy a gothic art style that brings the eerie atmosphere to life.
  • Team collaboration: Work with friends to solve puzzles and escape.
  • Customizable characters: Personalize your survivor or hunter to match your style.
